ResourceHeader.Description: Defense Meteorological Satellite Program, DMSP-F19 19th flight unit of the DMSP Block 5D series, 5th of the Block 5D-3 series. The 1,200 kg DMSP-F19 satellited provide terrestrial and space weather data from a near-polar, Sun-synchronous, 830 km altitude orbit with the Local Time nodes for DMSP F18 of about 17:30 and about 05:30. Main missions: cloud imagery and MW imaging/temperature/humidity sounding. Substantial contribution to Space weather. Operation interrupted by a telecommand outage on 11 February 2016. Satellite loss confirmed on 24 March.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: DMSP Data Manager, NOAA National Environmental Satellite, Data, and Information Service, NESDIS
